pkgmetadata.longdescription:
JinjaX

From chaos to clarity: The power of components in your server-side-rendered Python web app.**Documentation:** https://jinjax.scaletti.dev/Write server-side components as single Jinja template files.Use them as HTML tags without doing any importing.## About- This project is developed by *Juan-Pablo Scaletti*.
- I love building products and sharing knowledge.
